#{pdtModifytime}

1=1 AND pdt_id = #{pdtId} AND pdt_no = #{pdtNo} AND inst_id = #{instId} AND pdt_name = #{pdtName} AND pdt_icon = #{pdtIcon} AND pdt_type = #{pdtType} AND pdt_contract_id = #{pdtContract_id} AND pdt_cycle = #{pdtCycle} AND pdt_cycle_unit = #{pdtCycle_unit} AND pdt_cycle_unit_days = #{pdtCycle_unit_days} AND pdt_cycle_in_days = #{pdtCycle_in_days} AND pdt_start_yield_type = #{pdtStart_yield_type} AND pdt_confirm_date = #{pdtConfirm_date} AND pdt_start_yield_date = #{pdtStart_yield_date} AND pdt_start_allot_yield_date = #{pdtStart_allot_yield_date} AND pdt_expire_date = #{pdtExpire_date} AND pdt_refund_date = #{pdtRefund_date} AND pdt_yield_count_type = #{pdtYield_count_type} AND pdt_yield_type = #{pdtYield_type} AND pdt_yield_mode = #{pdtYield_mode} AND pdt_expect_yield_rate = #{pdtExpect_yield_rate} AND pdt_guaranteed_yield_rate = #{pdtGuaranteed_yield_rate} AND pdt_expect_yield_unit = #{pdtExpect_yield_unit} AND pdt_stock_count = #{pdtStock_count} AND pdt_reach_count = #{pdtReach_count} AND pdt_min_order_count = #{pdtMin_order_count} AND pdt_max_order_count = #{pdtMax_order_count} AND pdt_person_limit_count = #{pdtPerson_limit_count} AND pdt_unit_price = #{pdtUnit_price} AND pdt_increase_unitcount = #{pdtIncrease_unitcount} AND pdt_allow_advance_refund = #{pdtAllow_advance_refund} AND pdt_advance_refund_fee = #{pdtAdvance_refund_fee} AND pdt_onsale_time = #{pdtOnsale_time} AND pdt_offsale_time = #{pdtOffsale_time} AND pdt_expire_next_step = #{pdtExpire_next_step} AND pdt_default_expire_next_step = #{pdtDefault_expire_next_step} AND pdt_day_type = #{pdtDay_type} AND pdt_auto_confirm_order = #{pdtAuto_confirm_order} AND pdt_status = #{pdtStatus} AND pdt_weight = #{pdtWeight} AND pdt_related_id = #{pdtRelated_id} AND pdt_createtime = #{pdtCreatetime} AND pdt_modifytime = #{pdtModifytime}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_product AS product

SELECT product.pdt_id as pdtId, product.pdt_no as pdtNo, product.inst_id as instId, product.pdt_name as pdtName, product.pdt_icon as pdtIcon, product.pdt_type as pdtType, product.pdt_contract_id as pdtContract_id, product.pdt_cycle as pdtCycle, product.pdt_cycle_unit as pdtCycle_unit, product.pdt_cycle_unit_days as pdtCycle_unit_days, product.pdt_cycle_in_days as pdtCycle_in_days, product.pdt_start_yield_type as pdtStart_yield_type, product.pdt_confirm_date as pdtConfirm_date, product.pdt_start_yield_date as pdtStart_yield_date, product.pdt_start_allot_yield_date as pdtStart_allot_yield_date, product.pdt_expire_date as pdtExpire_date, product.pdt_refund_date as pdtRefund_date, product.pdt_yield_count_type as pdtYield_count_type, product.pdt_yield_type as pdtYield_type, product.pdt_yield_mode as pdtYield_mode, product.pdt_expect_yield_rate as pdtExpect_yield_rate, product.pdt_guaranteed_yield_rate as pdtGuaranteed_yield_rate, product.pdt_expect_yield_unit as pdtExpect_yield_unit, product.pdt_stock_count as pdtStock_count, product.pdt_reach_count as pdtReach_count, product.pdt_min_order_count as pdtMin_order_count, product.pdt_max_order_count as pdtMax_order_count, product.pdt_person_limit_count as pdtPerson_limit_count, product.pdt_unit_price as pdtUnit_price, product.pdt_increase_unitcount as pdtIncrease_unitcount, product.pdt_allow_advance_refund as pdtAllow_advance_refund, product.pdt_advance_refund_fee as pdtAdvance_refund_fee, product.pdt_onsale_time as pdtOnsale_time, product.pdt_offsale_time as pdtOffsale_time, product.pdt_expire_next_step as pdtExpire_next_step, product.pdt_default_expire_next_step as pdtDefault_expire_next_step, product.pdt_day_type as pdtDay_type, product.pdt_auto_confirm_order as pdtAuto_confirm_order, product.pdt_status as pdtStatus, product.pdt_weight as pdtWeight, product.pdt_related_id as pdtRelated_id, product.pdt_createtime as pdtCreatetime, product.pdt_modifytime as pdtModifytime FROM dr_product AS product WHERE pdt_id = #{pdtId}

SELECT product.pdt_id as pdtId, product.pdt_no as pdtNo, product.inst_id as instId, product.pdt_name as pdtName, product.pdt_icon as pdtIcon, product.pdt_type as pdtType, product.pdt_contract_id as pdtContract_id, product.pdt_cycle as pdtCycle, product.pdt_cycle_unit as pdtCycle_unit, product.pdt_cycle_unit_days as pdtCycle_unit_days, product.pdt_cycle_in_days as pdtCycle_in_days, product.pdt_start_yield_type as pdtStart_yield_type, product.pdt_confirm_date as pdtConfirm_date, product.pdt_start_yield_date as pdtStart_yield_date, product.pdt_start_allot_yield_date as pdtStart_allot_yield_date, product.pdt_expire_date as pdtExpire_date, product.pdt_refund_date as pdtRefund_date, product.pdt_yield_count_type as pdtYield_count_type, product.pdt_yield_type as pdtYield_type, product.pdt_yield_mode as pdtYield_mode, product.pdt_expect_yield_rate as pdtExpect_yield_rate, product.pdt_guaranteed_yield_rate as pdtGuaranteed_yield_rate, product.pdt_expect_yield_unit as pdtExpect_yield_unit, product.pdt_stock_count as pdtStock_count, product.pdt_reach_count as pdtReach_count, product.pdt_min_order_count as pdtMin_order_count, product.pdt_max_order_count as pdtMax_order_count, product.pdt_person_limit_count as pdtPerson_limit_count, product.pdt_unit_price as pdtUnit_price, product.pdt_increase_unitcount as pdtIncrease_unitcount, product.pdt_allow_advance_refund as pdtAllow_advance_refund, product.pdt_advance_refund_fee as pdtAdvance_refund_fee, product.pdt_onsale_time as pdtOnsale_time, product.pdt_offsale_time as pdtOffsale_time, product.pdt_expire_next_step as pdtExpire_next_step, product.pdt_default_expire_next_step as pdtDefault_expire_next_step, product.pdt_day_type as pdtDay_type, product.pdt_auto_confirm_order as pdtAuto_confirm_order, product.pdt_status as pdtStatus, product.pdt_weight as pdtWeight, product.pdt_related_id as pdtRelated_id, product.pdt_createtime as pdtCreatetime, product.pdt_modifytime as pdtModifytime FROM dr_product AS product
${orderby}
